name.en: Seminar on Cross-Strait Relations and Its Leading Figures
name.ch: 當代兩岸關係史及相關人物專題研究

goal.en: "To understand the reason of why Taiwan can resist the fate of being Sovietized and history of cross-strait conflict and competition, with previous to explore the development and impact of cross-strait relations since 1980s."
goal.ch: 理解1949年後台灣為何能夠免於共產赤化命運的原因及兩岸衝突及競爭的始末，並探討八○年代以來兩岸關係之發展及其影響。

content.en:
1. The Comparison of Cross-Strait Relations to International Relation
2. The Cause of Cold War and China Issues
3. Quemoy Campaign War and Cross-Strait Relations
4. The Influence of Korean War on Cross-Strait Relations
5. The First Crisis of Taiwan Strait and Its Influence on Cross-Strait Relations
6. The Secret Messenger and Cross-Strait Relations
7. The Second Crisis of Taiwan Strait and Its Influence on Cross-Strait Relations
8. The Split of China & Russia and Its Influence on Cross-Strait Relations
9. The Comparison of Cross-Strait Economic Developments in 1950’s
10. Nuclear Weapons and Cross-Strait Relations
11. The Issues on Chinese Representation in United Nations and Its Influence on Cross-Strait Relations
12. The Thaw of China & U.S Relation and Its Influence on Cross-Strait Relations
13. The Change of Cross-Strait Relations in 1980’s
14. “Guidelines for National Unification” and Cross-Strait Relations
15. The Third Crisis of Taiwan Strait and Its Influence on Cross-Strait Relations
content.ch:
一、 兩岸關係與國際關係之比較
二、 冷戰的形成與中國問題
三、 古寧頭戰役與兩岸關係
四、 韓戰與兩岸關係
五、 臺海一次危機與兩岸關係
六、 密使與兩岸關係
七、 臺海二次危機與兩岸關係
八、 中蘇分裂與兩岸關係
九、 五十年代的兩岸經濟發展之比較
十、 核子武器與兩岸關係
十一、 聯合國中國代表權問題與兩岸關係
十二、 中美關係解凍與兩岸關係
十三、 八十年代兩岸關係的變遷
十四、 〈國統綱領〉與兩岸關係
十五、 臺海三次危機與兩岸關係
